issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When using the admin user in the eucalyptus account, euare-useraddpolicy doesn't work when the delegate option is used against a user under a non-eucalyptus account. {code} # euare-useraddpolicy --delegate=hspencer -u rza-test -p all -e Allow -a '"ec2:*Describe*","ec2:*Run*"' -r 'arn:aws:iam::hspencer:user/rza-test' -D 2013-02-24 17:09:27,284 AddUserPolicy [DEBUG]:request_params: {'DelegateAccount': 'hspencer'} 2013-02-24 17:09:27,284 AddUserPolicy [DEBUG]:request_params: {'UserName': 'rza-test', 'PolicyName': 'all', 'PolicyDocument': '{"Version":"2008-10-17","Statement":[{"Effect":"Allow", "Action":[""ec2:*Describe*","ec2:*Run*""], "Resource":["arn:aws:iam::hspencer:user/rza-test"]}]}'} 2013-02-24 17:09:27,285 AddUserPolicy [DEBUG]:Using access key provided by client. 2013-02-24 17:09:27,285 AddUserPolicy [DEBUG]:Using secret key provided by client. 2013-02-24 17:09:27,285 AddUserPolicy [DEBUG]:Method: GET 2013-02-24 17:09:27,285 AddUserPolicy [DEBUG]:Path: /services/Euare/ 2013-02-24 17:09:27,285 AddUserPolicy [DEBUG]:Data: 2013-02-24 17:09:27,285 AddUserPolicy [DEBUG]:Headers: {} 2013-02-24 17:09:27,285 arn:aws:iam::hspencer:user/admin arn:aws:iam::hspencer:user/hspencer-test arn:aws:iam::hspencer:user/rza-test {code}

com.eucalyptus.auth.euare.EuareService.putUserPolicy(EuareService.java:417) | Caused by: java.util.NoSuchElementException: Can not find user rza-test in eucalyptus | Can not find user rza-test {code} Question - is there a misunderstanding as to what the purpose of the "delegate" option should be used? If so, when and how should it be used?
This is a tool bug.  It isn't passing the DelegateAccount parameter properly internally.

commit c3cdefb225be9b430eb0d73038f0a90d1ac5483a
Author: Garrett Holmstrom <gholms@fedoraproject.org>
Date:   Thu Feb 28 14:33:16 2013 -0800

    Make usercreatepolicy pass DelegateAccount
    
    Fixes TOOLS-274
This is testable by having a user in the eucalyptus account add a policy to a user in another account using {{euare-useraddpolicy --delegate}}.
